PART II REDEFINING GENDERED SPACE

Chapter 3 "A Dream of Flying"

"Fly the coop . . . jumbling the order of space."

"The air is no place for a woman."

"But, of course, we couldn't let you girls fly again."

"We have all learned the art of flying and its numerous techniques."

"And once the old world has turned on its axle so that the new dawn can dawn, then, ah, then! all th...

"She will tear off her mind forg'd manacles, will rise up and fly away."

"But why drag in the stars?"

"'Go and find your new world, dear,' [Gudrun] said."
